author: Lisa Mumm
comment: App causes ghosting (dead, not fixable pixes).

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that you're having pixel issues with your watch. Just A Minute leverages standard Android Wear technology to prevent this kind of thing from happening. We suggest that you contact the manufacturer of your watch to see if anything can be done to remedy the situation.

author: Jonathan Chong
comment: Had trouble getting it to work initially, but the quick response from the team helped. Loving the watch face. Thanks.
title: Love it!

author: Albert Wood
comment: Not really worth the money, not many features.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. Your support helps fund future development and new features. More coming soon!

title: Good some money goes to charity

author: Dan Foskey
comment: Great app and great customer help.
title: Wear with Pride

author: Andrew S
comment: Does not work on the lg urbane.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that you're having problems with the watch face on the LG Urbane. Can you please write us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help troubleshoot the issue? Thanks!

author: David Dodge
comment: You'll need to turn off card previews in order to use this watch face since the cards being previewed at the bottom of the display will cover the hours between 5 and 7, AM and PM.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi David, we just uploaded version 2.7.2 which fixes this issue. Thanks for your continued support!

title: One Flaw

author: Andra
comment: Love the face. Only one complaint. Love to be able to change font.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you for the suggestion! Version 2.7 now includes some fun-looking fonts. To change the font, open the app and tap the drop down next to the Font selector. Enjoy!

title: Show your pride!

author: Ross Manges
comment: Looks great, a subtle way to show my pride.
title: Show my pride with a great looking watch face!
